item.title: 油价因美国有望补充战略储备而回升
item.description: 周四，油价因美国可能开始购买原油作为石油储备的前景而上涨，此前油价曾因以色列-加沙停火的希望、对美国降息的疑虑以及石油库存膨胀而跌至七周低点。【原文：Oil prices rose on Thursday on the prospect the U.S. may start buying crude for its petroleum reserve, after prices sank to a seven-week low on hopes for an Israel-Gaza ceasefire, doubts about U.S. interest rate cuts and swelling oil inventories.】

item.title: 韩国 4 月工厂活动萎缩，但对前景的乐观情绪回升
item.description: 周四的一项私营部门调查显示，韩国 4 月份的工厂活动再次萎缩，但制造商的乐观情绪攀升至近两年来的最高水平，原因是产量和订单都出现了小幅增长。【原文：South Korea's factory activity contracted again in April, but manufacturers' optimism climbed to the highest level in nearly two years as output and orders managed to post marginal growth, a private-sector survey showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 拜耳公司的孟山都公司在华盛顿法院赢得了对 1.85 亿美元多氯联苯判决的撤销权
item.description: 华盛顿州一家上诉法院周三推翻了拜耳旗下孟山都公司因西雅图地区一所学校的化学污染问题而被判赔偿 1.85 亿美元的判决，这是孟山都公司在几周内赢得的第二场重大官司。【原文：A Washington state appeals court on Wednesday overturned a $185 million verdict against Bayer's Monsanto unit over chemical contamination at a Seattle-area school, marking the second big legal win for the company in as many weeks.】

item.title: 降息推迟，亚洲股市震荡；日元飙升
item.description: 在美联储宣布推迟降息后，周四亚洲股市开局不稳，而美元则因日元大幅下跌，交易员认为这是日本的干预。【原文：Asian stocks got off to a shaky start on Thursday after the Federal Reserve flagged delays to interest rate cuts, while the dollar fell heavily on the yen in what traders reckoned was Japanese intervention.】

item.title: 韩国 4 月消费者通胀率降至 2.9
item.description: 韩国官方数据周四显示，韩国4月份消费者通胀率三个月来首次下降，低于经济学家的预期，支持了市场对韩国下半年放松货币政策的预期。【原文：South Korea's consumer inflation eased in April for the first time in three months, official data showed on Thursday, coming in lower than economists' estimates and supporting market expectations for monetary easing in the latter half of the year.】

item.title: 澳大利亚伍尔沃斯第三季度销售额增长，消费者情绪谨慎
item.description: 周四，澳大利亚伍尔沃斯公司（Woolworths）公布第三季度销售额增长，食品零售部门的业绩改善推动了销售额的增长，但该公司警告称，尽管通胀有所缓和，但消费者仍将保持谨慎。【原文：Australia's Woolworths reported a rise in third-quarter sales on Thursday, boosted by an improving performance in the food retail segment, but warned of continued consumer caution despite moderating inflation.】

item.title: 新加坡星展银行第一季度净利润同比增长 15%，创历史新高
item.description: 新加坡最大的银行星展集团周四公布，在总收入强劲增长的推动下，第一季度净利润同比增长15%，达到29.6亿新元（21.8亿美元），创历史新高。【原文：DBS Group , Singapore's biggest bank, posted on Thursday a 15% rise in net profit in the first quarter to a record high of S$2.96 billion ($2.18 billion) from a year earlier, driven by strong total income growth.】

item.title: 赌场运营商米高梅澳门业务强劲，第一季度业绩超出预期
item.description: 美高梅国际酒店集团（MGM Resorts International）周三公布的第一季度业绩超出华尔街预期，主要得益于其中国业务的强劲表现，该赌场运营商继续受益于疫情后入境限制的放宽。【原文：MGM Resorts International beat first-quarter Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, driven by strength in its China operations as the casino operator continues to benefit from easing post-pandemic entry restrictions.】

item.title: 澳大利亚国民银行上半年现金收益下降 13
item.description: 澳大利亚国民银行（National Australia Bank）周四公布的上半年现金利润下降了约 13%，因为这家澳大利亚排名第二的银行正在努力应对高昂的运营成本和残酷的竞争。澳大利亚国民银行（National Australia Bank）周四公布的上半年现金利润下降了约 13%，原因是该国排名第二的贷款机构正在努力应对高昂的运营成本和残酷的竞争。【原文：National Australia Bank on Thursday posted an about 13% drop in its first-half cash profit as the country's no. 2 lender grappled with high operating costs and cutthroat competition.】

item.title: 由于客户支出稳定，Cognizant 第一季度收入超出预期
item.description: 受客户稳定支出的帮助，Cognizant Technology Solutions 周三公布的第一季度营收超出华尔街预期，使其股价在盘后交易中上涨超过 4%。【原文：Cognizant Technology Solutions beat Wall Street estimates for first-quarter revenue on Wednesday, helped by steady spending by clients, sending its shares up more than 4% in aftermarket trading.】

item.title: 早间新闻鲍威尔引发股市波动，日元飙升
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 价格上涨，马拉松石油公司第一季度利润略超预期
item.description: 受石油和液化天然气（LNG）价格上涨的影响，石油和天然气公司马拉松石油公司（Marathon Oil）周三的第一季度利润略高于预期。【原文：Oil and gas firm Marathon Oil narrowly beat first-quarter profit estimates on Wednesday, helped by higher oil and liquefied natural gas (LNG) pricing.】

item.title: 大都会人寿第一季度利润因保费和投资收益增加而增长
item.description: 大都会人寿保险公司周三公布第一季度利润增长，主要得益于保费增长和强劲的投资回报。【原文：MetLife reported a rise in first-quarter profit on Wednesday, helped by higher premiums and strong returns from investments.】

item.title: 由于电动汽车销售增长放缓，芯片制造商 Wolfspeed 预计季度收入低于预期
item.description: 芯片制造商 Wolfspeed 周三预计，由于电动汽车销售增长低于预期，汽车制造商正努力应对高库存水平，本季度营收将低于预期。【原文：Chipmaker Wolfspeed forecast current-quarter revenue below estimates on Wednesday as automakers grapple with high inventory levels due to slower-than-expected EV sales growth.】

item.title: 对核心利润和零售额的乐观预测使 Carvana 股价大涨
item.description: 周三，二手车销售商 Carvana 预测本季度零售额和核心利润将意外增长，该公司股价在盘后交易中大涨 30%以上。【原文：Shares of Carvana surged more than 30% in extended trading on Wednesday after the used-car seller forecast a surprise rise in current quarter retail sales and core profit.】

item.title: First Solar 因需求强劲而实现季度利润增长
item.description: First Solar 周三公布的第一季度利润与去年同期相比有所增长，主要得益于太阳能需求的恢复性增长。【原文：First Solar reported higher first-quarter profit on Wednesday compared to the same period last year, helped by resilient demand for solar energy.】

item.title: 日本央行干预阴影笼罩下的日元兑美元汇率跳涨
item.description: 周三晚些时候，日元兑美元跳涨，交易员高度警惕日本货币当局干预的迹象，以提振徘徊在34年低点附近的货币。【原文：The yen jumped against the dollar late on Wednesday, with traders on high alert for signs of intervention by Japanese monetary authorities to boost a currency languishing near 34-year lows.】

item.title: 康卡斯特撤下百利体育频道，危及美国广播公司重组
item.description: 有线电视供应商康卡斯特周三停止播出百利体育频道，导致部分 MLB 比赛停播，并危及体育频道运营公司的破产重组。【原文：Cable provider Comcast stopped broadcasting Bally Sports channels on Wednesday, taking some MLB games off the air and imperiling the bankruptcy restructuring of the sports channels' operating company.】

item.title: 摩根大通将就交易报告漏洞向美国监管机构支付 1 亿美元
item.description: 摩根大通周三在一份监管文件中披露，该公司预计将与第三家美国监管机构达成一项决议，要求其支付 1 亿美元的民事罚款，原因是该公司向监控平台报告的交易数据不完整。【原文：JPMorgan Chase expects to enter into a resolution with a third U.S. regulator that will require it to pay a civil penalty of $100 million for reporting incomplete trading data to surveillance platforms, it disclosed in a regulatory filing on Wednesday.】

item.title: Etsy 第一季度销售额和利润不及预期，原因是自由支配需求下降
item.description: Etsy 周三未能达到华尔街对其第一季度商品销售总额（GMS）和利润的预期，原因是其在线市场对手工艺品和个性化礼品的需求下降。【原文：Etsy missed Wall Street expectations for first-quarter gross merchandise sales (GMS) and profit on Wednesday, hurt by lower demand for its handcrafted goods and personalized gifts at its online marketplace.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，埃克森将与美国联邦贸易委员会达成协议，禁止先锋公司首席执行官进入董事会
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三援引知情人士的话报道，埃克森美孚在与反垄断执法机构达成协议，不将先锋自然资源公司首席执行官斯科特-谢菲尔德（Scott Sheffield）加入其董事会后，将完成以 600 亿美元收购先锋自然资源公司（Pioneer Natural Resources）的交易。【原文：Exxon Mobil is set to close its $60 billion deal for Pioneer Natural Resources following an agreement with antitrust enforcers to not add Pioneer CEO Scott Sheffield to its board, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 摩根大通称其俄罗斯资产可能在俄罗斯和美国诉讼后被扣押
item.description: 摩根大通银行在周三提交的一份文件中称，在俄罗斯和美国法院提起诉讼后，该行在俄罗斯的资产可能会被查封。【原文：JPMorgan Chase said its assets in Russia may be seized after lawsuits in Russian and U.S. courts, the bank said in a filing on Wednesday.】

item.title: Albemarle 第一季度利润低于预期
item.description: 由于价格下跌，全球最大的电动汽车电池用锂生产商 Albemarle 公司第一季度利润未达预期。【原文：Albemarle , the world's largest producer of lithium for electric vehicle batteries, on Wednesday missed first quarter profit estimates on lower prices.】

item.title: AIG 盈利超出预期，承保能力强劲
item.description: 美国国际集团周三公布的第一季度利润超出预期，主要得益于其产险、寿险和养老险部门的增长，以及巨灾损失的减少。【原文：American International Group exceeded first-quarter profit expectations on Wednesday, driven by growth in its general insurance as well as life and retirement divisions, and lower catastrophe losses.】

item.title: 德文郡能源公司第一季度利润超出预期，原因是产量增加
item.description: 美国页岩气生产商德文能源公司（Devon Energy）周三公布的第一季度利润超出预期，原因是产量增加帮助该公司抵消了天然气价格下跌的影响。【原文：U.S. shale producer Devon Energy beat first-quarter profit estimates on Wednesday as higher production helped it offset a decline in natural gas prices.】

item.title: EBay 预测季度收入低于预期
item.description: 电子商务公司 eBay 周三预计，由于收藏品和汽车零部件等产品类别的需求降温，第二季度营收将低于华尔街预期。【原文：Ecommerce firm eBay forecast second-quarter revenue below Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, as demand cools for product categories like collector's items and auto parts.】

item.title: 由于成本增加，DoorDash 预计季度核心利润低于预期
item.description: 尽管 DoorDash 第一季度营收超过预期，但该公司周三预计第二季度核心利润低于预期，这表明成本上升抵消了杂货和食品订单增加带来的部分收益。【原文：DoorDash projected second-quarter core profit below expectations on Wednesday despite beating first-quarter revenue estimates, indicating that higher costs were offseting some of its gains from rising groceries and food orders.】

item.title: 人工智能重振智能手机市场，高通公司业绩预期超预期
item.description: 受人工智能功能推动智能手机市场复苏速度超过预期的影响，高通公司周三预计第三财季销售额和调整后利润将高于华尔街预期。【原文：Qualcomm on Wednesday forecast fiscal third-quarter sales and adjusted profit above Wall Street expectations, driven by a faster-than-expected recovery in smartphone markets thanks to artificial-intelligence features.】

item.title: 广告参与度下降，Airbnb 启动新的全球营销战略
item.description: Airbnb 周三宣布了其最新的营销战略，旨在通过提供独特的体验来吸引新客户，并将其业务拓展到度假租赁这一核心业务之外。【原文：Airbnb announced its newest marketing strategy geared towards bringing in new customers by offering unique experiences as it expands beyond its core business of vacation rentals, the company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美联储鲍威尔称大选在即不会左右利率决定
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）周三重申，围绕迫在眉睫的总统大选的政治考量不会影响央行的利率决策。【原文：Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell reiterated Wednesday that political considerations around the looming presidential election will not affect the central bank's interest rate decisions.】
